created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the entity was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the entity's most recent update

directory_uid.description: Unique identifier for a directory. Defines which directory is authorized to sell this offering.

offering_uid.description: Unique identifier for an offering. Defines an offering the directory is authorized to sell.

description: The directoryOffering represents the association of a directory with an offering, allowing the directory to provide the underlying product to its businesses under a specific commercial agreement.
